entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT) crash on android release when forcing screen orientation #22106
  • On Platform="Default" not working #22105
  • VisualState Setters not working properly on Windows for a CollectionView #22104
  • ColectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReached is constatli coled #22101

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix PointerGestureHandler not registering touches on android #22109
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) (take 2) #22108
    community ✨
  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView - fix #22107
    community ✨
  • [Controls] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #22102
    community ✨
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    community ✨

Merged

  • Improve error logging for failed resizetizering #22064
    area/single project ☝️

Updated

  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    area/drawing ✏️, control-border
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area/Xaml </>
  • Make ImageSource more async-friendly #22098
    community ✨
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Core] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Remove excess check in iOS input transparency checks #21883
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
